definition: wing/area surrounding the bullseye of a target/to assist/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy/old variant of 翌
surname Yi/alternative name for 絳|绛[Jiang4] capital of the Jin State during the Spring and Autumn Period (770-475 BC)

sentences.english: This produces a far right that likes nationalisation and dislikes the market.
sentences.chinese: 这催生了喜好国有化，厌恶市场的极右翼主义。

sentences.english: In chapter four, the foreground of the European ultra-rightist parties is addressed.
sentences.chinese: 第四章欧洲极右翼政党的发展前景。

sentences.english: The Japanese radical left-wing movement has been verystrongly agitating for a very long time for the U. S. Navy to be kicked out ofJapan.
sentences.chinese: 日本极右翼组织一直以来都鼓吹将美国海军踢出日本。

sentences.english: They supported the most right-wing candidate.
sentences.chinese: 她们全拥护极右翼的那位候选人。

sentences.english: In chapter two, the evidences and the influences of the European ultra-rightist parties' sudden rise are mentioned.
sentences.chinese: 第二章欧洲极右翼政党异军突起的主要表现和影响。

sentences.english: Japan politicians are mainly supported by extreme right-wing organizations (aka Yakoza).
sentences.chinese: 日本的政客主要依靠极右翼组织的支持。

sentences.english: Welcome to the disturbing new face of the radical right in America.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎观看美国极右翼的新面孔。

sentences.english: Yet some far-right ideas have percolated into the mainstream.
sentences.chinese: 然而一些极右翼思想已经渗透到了主流之中。

sentences.english: In chapter three, the subjective and objective reasons of the European ultra-rightist parties' sudden rise are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 第三章欧洲极右翼政党异军突起的主客观原因。

sentences.english: Usually the far right has been de-fanged in a ruling coalition.
sentences.chinese: 通常，极右翼主义在联合统治下失去威力。

definition: Jean-Marie Le Pen (1928-), French Front National extreme right-wing politician
(Tw) Emmanuel Macron (1977-), president of France from 2017
